name: SemanticUi

types.name: Size
types.comment: Some elements might have different sizes.

values.name: col
values.comment:
Create the `Html msg` for a grid col.

    col "two" [ div [] [] ]

values.name: container
values.comment:
Create the `Html msg` for a grid container.

    container [html content]

values.name: events
values.comment:
Set placeholder for input element

    input [] |> events [ onInput InputTextMsg ]
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> SemanticUi.Element (SemanticUi.EventEmitter a msg) msg -> SemanticUi.Element (SemanticUi.EventEmitter a msg) msg

values.name: fluid
values.comment:
Add fluid class to input element

    input [] |> fluid
values.type: SemanticUi.Element (SemanticUi.WithAttributes a msg) msg -> SemanticUi.Element (SemanticUi.WithAttributes a msg) msg

values.name: input
values.comment: A inout with a html attributes

values.name: placeholder
values.comment:
Set placeholder for input element

    input [] |> placeholder "write here..."
values.type: String -> SemanticUi.Element (SemanticUi.Writable a) msg -> SemanticUi.Element (SemanticUi.Writable a) msg

values.name: render
values.comment:
Create the `Html msg` for a Semantic UI `Element`.

    button "click" |> render

values.name: row
values.comment:
Create the `Html msg` for a grid row.

    row []Â [ div [] [] ]
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: size
values.comment:
Adjust the size of an element.

    button "click" |> size Huge
values.type: SemanticUi.Size -> SemanticUi.Element (SemanticUi.Sized a) msg -> SemanticUi.Element (SemanticUi.Sized a) msg
